entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 70
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
